{"file":"third_party/managed/assimp/README.md","purpose":"Documents optional Assimp drop-in structure.","exports":[],"depends_on":["third_party/managed/assimp/include","third_party/managed/assimp/lib","third_party/managed/assimp/bin"],"notes":["local_override_optional","preferred_vcpkg_source"]}
<!-- Human Summary -->
Populate this directory with Assimp headers under `include/`, libraries under `lib/`, and DLLs in `bin/` if you cannot rely on system or vcpkg installs.
